properties.areaDesc: Bossier, LA; De Soto, LA; Caddo, LA
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 10 at 12:53PM CST until February 10 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Northwestern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Southern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana...

* Until 345 PM CST.

* At 1251 PM CST, gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain across the warned area. Up to two inches of rain have
already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin
shortly.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Automated gauges.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Shreveport, Bossier City, Haughton, Stonewall, Eastwood, Fosters,
Keachi, Keat Chie, Curtis, Spring Ridge, Fillmore, Bodcau, Koran,
Ninock, Kickapoo, Keithville, Mc Dade, Reeds Store, Gloster and
Frierson.

Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 are possible in the warned
area over the next hour.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:45 PM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
